title: Turrican Soundtrack Anthology Original Sound Version Vol 1
description:
This album contains music from the Turrican series of games, faithfully
recorded from the original hardware and carefully mixed and mastered for
audio systems today as well as headphone listening. Special thanks to all
of our Kickstarter backers and other supporters who helped to make this
project a reality! Volume 1 covers the games Turrican 1, Turrican 2 and
Turrican 3, released in 1990, 1991 and 1993 respectively.

This is the Original Sound Version Vol. 1 of the Turrican Soundtrack Anthology, featuring recordings of the actual Turrican game music from the original hardware machines. Carefully recorded, mixed and mastered by Holger Lagerfeldt.

released 31 December 2013
